name: Tomasz Lee

Proven history of driving operational excellence, enhancing team collaboration, and leading projects to successful outcomes. Additional experience in microservices architecture with tools like **Apache Kafka**, **RabbitMQ**, and **Redis** further strengthens the ability to deliver scalable applications.
